sentences.english: Make sure you drink plenty to save-off dehydration .
sentences.chinese: 记得喝多点水才不至于虚脱。

sentences.english: Two of the runners collapsed in a state of prostration.
sentences.chinese: 有两名赛跑选手因虚脱而倒下了。

sentences.english: I'm dog-tired after working for a whole day.
sentences.chinese: 一整天工作下来，我都快虚脱了。

sentences.english: One of the runners collapsed from exhaustion after the race.
sentences.chinese: 其中一个跑步者在赛跑后因为疲劳而虚脱了。

sentences.english: I frighten already some debilities, the weapon and thighs Mian softly heaves not to get up.
sentences.chinese: 我惊吓得已经有些虚脱，四肢绵软地抬不起来。

sentences.english: She is collapsed on the cell floor.
sentences.chinese: 她虚脱的躺在这个房间的地板上。
